element.hint: Enter the URL for the screen pop
element.label: URL
element.name: api_call

element.hint: Provide a name for the browser tab that will be opened when the screen is popped. Leave blank if opening a ServiceNow record
element.label: Browser tab
element.name: browser_tab

element.hint: Select the call state which will trigger this screen pop
element.label: Call state
element.name: call_state

element.hint: Provide a clear description for this Screen Pop
element.label: Description
element.name: description

element.hint: Enter the Language code to match for the screen to pop
element.label: Language code
element.name: language

element.hint: Enter the Queue Flow to match for the screen to pop
element.label: Queue flow
element.name: queue

element.hint: Enter the Reason code to match for the screen to pop
element.label: Reason
element.name: reason

element.hint: Enter the Subreason code to match for the screen to pop
element.label: Subreason
element.name: subreason

element.hint: Enter the Zone to match for the screen to pop
element.label: Zone
element.name: zone
